PROJECT(VTK)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
VTKPluginInfo.C
VTKCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
VTKPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
VTKMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtVTKFileFormat.C
avtVTKOptions.C
vtkVisItDataReader.C
vtkVisItDataSetReader.C
vtkVisItPolyDataReader.C

vtkVisItStructuredPointsReader.C
vtkVisItUnstructuredGridReader.C

vtkVisItBase64OutputStream.C

vtkVisItDataCompressor.C
vtkVisItInputStream.C
vtkVisItOutputStream.C
vtkVisItXMLDataElement.C
vtkVisItXMLDataParser.C
vtkVisItXMLDataReader.C
vtkVisItXMLFileReadTester.C
vtkVisItXMLImageDataReader.C
vtkVisItXMLParser.C
vtkVisItXMLPolyDataReader.C
vtkVisItXMLReader.C
vtkVisItXMLRectilinearGridReader.C
vtkVisItXMLStructuredDataReader.C
vtkVisItXMLStructuredGridReader.C
vtkVisItXMLUnstructuredDataReader.C
vtkVisItXMLUnstructuredGridReader.C
vtkVisItXMLUtilities.C
vtkVisItZLibDataCompressor.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
VTKEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtVTKFileFormat.C
avtVTKOptions.C
avtVTKWriter.C
vtkVisItDataReader.C
vtkVisItDataSetReader.C
vtkVisItPolyDataReader.C

vtkVisItStructuredGridReader.C

vtkVisItUnstructuredGridReader.C

vtkVisItBase64OutputStream.C

vtkVisItDataCompressor.C
vtkVisItInputStream.C
vtkVisItOutputStream.C
vtkVisItXMLDataElement.C
vtkVisItXMLDataParser.C

vtkVisItXMLImageDataReader.C

vtkVisItXMLRectilinearGridReader.C
vtkVisItXMLStructuredDataReader.C

vtkVisItXMLUnstructuredDataReader.C

vtkVisItZLibDataCompressor.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
)


SET(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH ${VISIT_PLUGIN_DIR}/databases)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IVTKDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IVTKDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IVTKDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MVTKDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES}    )
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MVTKDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(MVTKDatabase
        PROPERTIES
        COMPILE_FLAGS "-DMDSERVER"
    )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MVTKDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EVTKDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EVTKDatabase_ser visitcommon avtdatabase_ser avtpipeline_ser )
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(EVTKDatabase_ser
    PROPERTIES
    COMPILE_FLAGS "-DENGINE"
)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EVTKDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EVTKDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EVTKDatabase_par visitcommon avtdatabase_par avtpipeline_par )
    SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(EVTKDatabase_par
        PROPERTIES
        COMPILE_FLAGS "-DENGINE"
    )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EVTKDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
